name: Starship Theseus
description:
The HMS Theseus, a civilian vessel, finds itself surrounded by the evil forces of the space death prisms.  Upgrades to your ship are certainly necessary, but there is only so much space on the ship.  Do you need a weapon more than your ability to turn right?  Would a shield be better than your ability to fly backwards?

Controls:

W: Fly forward (activate rear equipment)

A, D: Turn left and right (activate left and right equipment slots)

Space: Shoot (actually activates front equipment slot, which starts out empty)

This game accompanies my performance art project in which I have slowly traded out my sanity, good coding practices, and ability to sleep during the last twenty four hours have been replaced with the phenomenon of seeing code when I close my eyes.  Will probably add more equipment if I can get that "selling my eternal soul for willpower" thing to go through.
